00038 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00039 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040 
00041 #include "pizGrowingArray.h"
00042 
00043 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00044 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 
00046 #include <stdlib.h>
00047 
00048 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 
00051 #define PIZ_DEFAULT_SIZE    4
00052 
00053 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00054 // -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00055 
00056 PIZGrowingArray *pizGrowingArrayNew (long size)
00057 {
00058     PIZGrowingArray *x = NULL;
00059 
00060     if (x = (PIZGrowingArray *)malloc (sizeof(PIZGrowingArray))) {       
00061         x->size = PIZ_DEFAULT_SIZE;
00062         
00063         if (size > 0) {
00064             x->size = size;
00065         }
00066         
00067         if (x->values = (long *)malloc (x->size * sizeof(long))) {
00068             x->index = 0;
00069         } else {
00070             free (x);
00071             x = NULL;
00072         }
00073     }
00074     
00075     return x;
00076 }
00077 
00078 void pizGrowingArrayFree (PIZGrowingArray *x)
00079 {
00080     if (x) {
00081         free (x->values);
00082         x->values = NULL;
00083             
00084         free (x);
00085     }
00086 }
00087 
00088 void pizGrowingArrayClear (PIZGrowingArray *x)
00089 {
00090     x->index = 0;
00091 }
00092 
00093 PIZError pizGrowingArrayAppend (PIZGrowingArray *x, long value)
00094 {   
00095     long err = PIZ_GOOD;
00096         
00097     if (x->index == x->size) {   
00098         long *newValues = NULL;
00099         
00100         if (newValues = (long *)realloc (x->values, (x->size * 2) * sizeof(long))) {
00101             x->size *= 2;
00102             x->values = newValues;
00103         } else {
00104             err = PIZ_MEMORY;
00105         }
00106     }
00107     
00108     if (err == PIZ_GOOD) {
00109         x->values[x->index] = value;
00110         x->index ++;
00111     }
00112         
00113     return err;
00114 }
00115 
00116 void pizGrowingArraySetValueAtIndex (PIZGrowingArray *x, long index, long value)
00117 {
00118     x->values[index] = value;
00119 }
00120 
00121 long pizGrowingArrayCount (const PIZGrowingArray *x)
00122 {
00123     return (x->index);
00124 }
00125 
00126 long pizGrowingArrayValueAtIndex (const PIZGrowingArray *x, long index)
00127 {   
00128     return (x->values[index]);
00129 }
00130 
00131 long *pizGrowingArrayPtr (const PIZGrowingArray *array)
00132 {
00133     return (array->values);
00134 }
